summary:
This mod adds a Sweetroll blast spell to the game.
The spell tome can be found at the Solitude Blue Palace kitchen on a table
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a Sweetroll blast spell to the game.
The spell tome can be found at the Solitude Blue Palace kitchen on a table

[b][Installation][/b]
Extract the contents of the rar into the game data folder and activate in the data files
[b][Uninstallation][/b]
Deactivate the mod in the data files and delete the files \\\"sweetrollblast.esp\\\" and \\\"sweetrollblast readme.txt\\\" from the game\\\'s data folder

[b][Known issues][/b]
When used inside places that are not owned by the player (ie. the Blue Palace where the tome is placed) the sweetrolls created by the blast will have the \\\"Steal\\\" options instead of the \\\"Take\\\"
author: IlanF
